name: .PDX File Extension
summary: Learn about .PDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Index file created by Adobe Acrobat, a document creator and viewer program; contains an index of documents and directories; enables the capability to search across multiple .PDF documents; useful for businesses that use large sets of PDF documents, such as lawyers.

content: PDX indexes can be created under the Choose Advanced → Document Processing → Full Text Index with Catalog option in Adobe Acrobat. Other files may be added to an existing PDX index using the same option.
Adobe Acrobat is available in Standard, Pro, and Pro Extended versions.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
